# Soumyo Sinha — Personal Website

> Marketing and technology executive with experience at Apple, Disney, Amazon, Microsoft, and Nokia. This site showcases professional background and side projects exploring AI, data visualization, and creative technology.

## Pages

- [About](https://www.soumyosinha.com/about): Background, career highlights, and impact metrics
- [Experience](https://www.soumyosinha.com/experience): Professional roles at Apple, Disney, Amazon, Microsoft, Nokia
- [Projects](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects): Portfolio of side projects
- [Reading](https://www.soumyosinha.com/reading): Book recommendations and reading log
- [Contact](https://www.soumyosinha.com/contact): How to get in touch

## Projects

- [Vaani](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/vaani): Talk to any document in any Indian language — chains 6 Sarvam AI models across 22 languages
- [The Crossover](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/attention-vs-tech): Animated data story visualizing declining attention spans vs rising AI/bot traffic
- [Searching for Food](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/searching-for-food): Interactive scrollytelling data story about India's food culture through Google search data
- [The Bookmark Library](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/twitter-bookmarks): 1,385 curated Twitter insights organized into 10 searchable categories
- [AI Investment Research](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/ai-investment-research): 4-agent AI pipeline analyzing 82 companies across the AI value chain
- [Company News Digest](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/company-news-digest): AI-ranked company news digests delivered to Slack
- [Say It In India](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/say-it-in-india): One story, thirty voices, eleven languages — hear India's emotions come alive
- [CineMagic](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/cinemagic): Movie and TV discovery with curated collections and regional cinema
- [Nestor](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/nestor-ai): Your guide to AI tools and resources
- [BBMP Work Tracker](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/bbmp-tracker): Civic tech for transparency in Bangalore public works
- [TallyPrime AI Assistant](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/tally-prime-assistant): AI-powered help for TallyPrime accounting software
- [2025 Reading Log](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/books-2025): Week-by-week reading tracker for 2025
- [Chicken Atlas](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/visual-cookbook): Ad-free visual cookbook with rich infographics
- [AI Product Imagery](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/product-imagery-fashion): Using AI to simplify fashion product photography
- [AI Marketing Toolkit](https://www.soumyosinha.com/projects/marketing-toolkit): Building marketing assets entirely with AI tools
